Name: :ref:`drop(String, Int): String <03_ride-language/03_functions:drop(String, Int): String>`
Description: "Drops the first n characters of a string"

Name: :ref:`dropRight(String, Int): String <03_ride-language/03_functions:dropRight(String, Int): String>`
Description: "Drops the last n characters of a string"

Name: :ref:`indexOf(String, String): Int|Unit <03_ride-language/03_functions:indexOf(String, String): Int|Unit>`
Description: "Returns the index of the first occurrence of a substring"

Name: :ref:`indexOf(String, String, Int): Int|Unit <03_ride-language/03_functions:indexOf(String, String, Int): Int|Unit>`
Description: "Returns the index of the first occurrence of a substring after a certain index"

Name: :ref:`lastIndexOf(String, String): Int|Unit <03_ride-language/03_functions:lastIndexOf(String, String): Int|Unit>`
Description: "Returns the index of the last occurrence of a substring"

Name: :ref:`lastindexOf(String, String, Int): Int|Unit <03_ride-language/03_functions:lastindexOf(String, String, Int): Int|Unit>`
Description: "Returns the index of the last occurrence of a substring before a certain index"

Name: :ref:`split(String, String): List[String] <03_ride-language/03_functions:split(String, String): List[String]>`
Description: "Splits a string delimited by a separator into a list of substrings."

Name: :ref:`take(String, Int): String <03_ride-language/03_functions:take(String, Int): String>`
Description: "Takes the first n characters from a string"

Name: :ref:`takeRight(String, Int): String <03_ride-language/03_functions:takeRight(String, Int): String>`
Description: "Takes the last n characters from a string"
